game.title: Return of the Lost Amulet
game.objective: Recover the lost Amulet of Power from the depths of the Ancient Ruins.
game.description: The Amulet of Power, a legendary artifact, has been stolen and is now hidden deep within the Ancient Ruins. Recover it and return it to the Archmage of the Arcane Order, Alderon.
game.reward: Amulet of Power (Legendary Artifact), 10,000 Gold, 10,000 Experience Points

task.objective: Locate the Entrance to the Ancient Ruins.
task.description: Uncover the entrance's mystery by examining local legends. The location is at Ruins of Oldhaven.

task.objective: Clear the Path to the Lost Amulet.
task.description: Defeat creatures and overcome traps to reach the entrance. Location: Ancient Ruins - Entrance.

task.objective: Solve the Puzzle of the Ancient Guardians.
task.description: Solve the riddle at the Inner Sanctum to bypass guardians. Location: Ancient Ruins - Inner Sanctum.
Carefully retrieve the amulet from the Vault of Power, guarded by powerful enchantments. Location: Ancient Ruins - Vault of Power.

task.objective: Return the Lost Amulet to Archmage Alderon.
task.description: Deliver the amulet to the Arcane Sanctum, where you'll receive your reward and witness its restoration. Location: Arcane Sanctum.
